Node.js Read File Async

Descripción

Read a file asynchronously using fs.promises


File Template: ❌


Prefix

node:fs:read


Scopes

javascript


Snippet de código

import fs from 'fs/promises';
try {
	const data = await fs.readFile('${1:filepath}', 'utf8');
	console.log(data);
} catch (error) {
	console.error('Error reading file:', error);
}
